dplforum-desc:
Short description of the [[mw:Extension:DPLforum|DPLforum extension]], shown on [[Special:Version]]. DPL stands for Dynamic Page Listing.
{{desc|name=DPLforum|url=https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:DPLforum}}
nstab-forum:
The name for the tab of the Forum namespace.
{{identical|Forum}}
tooltip-ca-nstab-forum: Tooltip shown when hovering over the {{msg-mw|Nstab-forum}} tab.
dplforum-by:
Part of the [[mw:Extension:DPLforum|DPLforum extension]]. DPL stands for Dynamic Page Listing.

Parameters:
* $1 - a username
{{Identical|By}}
